name: Ascension (e9k9)
description:
You are a lost soul whose mission is to reach the big tree at the top of the mountain where you can finally have your last rest. You meet other entities along the way, help them by solving color riddles so you can continue your journey.

This game is my second semester project. It aims to create a peaceful gameplay experience of relaxed puzzle solving and exploring a colorful world.

Movement: WASD/ Arrow Keys

Camera: Mouse

Talk/ Interact: E

Movement: Left Stick, DPad

Camera: Right Stick

Talk/ Interact: South Button

Unpack the .ZIP file and start the game via the .EXE inside the Build folder.
